---
name: RFC Proposal
title: "[RFC] "
about: Propose a breaking change or major feature
labels: rfc
---

## Summary
Provide a concise summary of the proposal.

## Problem
What problem are we solving? Who does it impact?

## Proposed solution
Describe the proposal at a high level. Include scope, constraints, and non-goals.

## Alternatives considered
List alternative approaches and why they were rejected.

## Risks
Call out known risks, migration costs, or compatibility concerns.

## Rollout plan
Outline how the change ships, including phases or flags.

## Open questions
List any decisions that still need consensus.
